featured.text: By contrast, later children are more likely to be more relaxed and sociable because their parents are more relaxed.
In contrast, the right hemisphere deals with feelings, colors, and long-term memory.

By contrast, men are much more likely to interrupt (about three times as often in some studies), to argue about what has been said, to ignore or respond poorly to what has been said, to introduce more new topics into the conversation, and to make more assertions.
To form a contrast with the iron structure of the old tower.

definition.en_def: The state of being strikingly different from something else in juxtaposition or close association.
definition.example: The contrast between the two paintings highlights the different styles of the artists.
